data.name: Nobu
data.description: A mysterious ninja master who summons Hand Ninjas and specializes in ambushing his opponents.

starItems.name: Nobu
starItems.description: A mysterious ninja master who summons Hand Ninjas and specializes in ambushing his opponents.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to the most injured ally

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Always gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally.

Gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>330%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> to self and the most injured ally.

Gain assist from a random <color=#fff568>HAND</color> or <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally.

1.description: Summon 1 Hand Ninja. Clear 1 negative effect from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster

2.description: Summon 1-2 Hand Ninjas. Clear 1 negative effect from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster > Hand Archer

3.description: Summon 1-2 Hand Ninjas. Clear 2 negative effects from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster > Hand Archer

4.description: Summon 2 Hand Ninjas. Clear 2 negative effects from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster > Hand Archer
4.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects from self
Summon Hand Ninjas with <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>

5.description: Summon 2 Hand Ninjas with Offense Up. Clear all negative effects from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster > Hand Archer
5.nextUpgrade:
Summon <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> Hand Ninjas
Summoned Hand Ninjas apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to this character

6.description: Summon 2-3 Hand Ninjas with Offense Up. Clear all negative effects from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster + Nobu gains Regeneration > Hand Archer + Nobu gains Regeneration

7.description: Summon 3 Hand Ninjas with Offense Up and Regeneration. Clear all negative effects from self. Possible Summons: > Hand Blademaster + Nobu gains Regeneration > Hand Archer + Nobu gains Regeneration

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.

2.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.

3.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.
3.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies

4.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.
4.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies

5.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to all allies
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies

6.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Counter</color> to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all allies.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to self and all allies.

1.description:
All <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.


On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Chance.
> If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage.
1.nextUpgrade: Non-<color=#fff568>HAND</color> and non-<color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health

2.description:
All <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health. All other allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.


On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Chance.
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage.
2.nextUpgrade: <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with +<color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health

3.description:
All <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health. All other allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.


On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Chance.
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage.
3.nextUpgrade: Non-<color=#fff568>HAND</color> and non-<color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with +<color=#86e619>5%</color> of Max Health

4.description:
All <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health. All other allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health.


On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Chance.
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage.

5.description:
All <color=#fff568>HAND</color> and <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> allies gain <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>20%</color> of Max Health. All other allies gain <color=#86e619>5%</color> chance to <color=#fff568>Revive</color> with <color=#86e619>15%</color> of Max Health.


On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Chance.
 > If this character, any <color=#fff568>HAND</color> ally, or any <color=#fff568>UNDERWORLD</color> ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, those characters gain <color=#86e619>+20%</color> Crit Damage.
